content.text:
# War in Abkhazia

War in Abkhazia may refer to these wars in Abkhazia:
*War in Abkhazia (1992–1993), when Abkhazia de-facto separated from Georgia after the dissolution of the Soviet Union and Georgian independence
*War in Abkhazia (1998), an insurgency by ethnic Georgians in the breakaway state
See also
*Abkhazia conflict (1989–present), the ongoing conflict between Abkhazia and Georgia
